channel.title: Tiki Bar on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Tiki Bar on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: The Polynesian
item.description: Summary This place is located near 42nd Street and 9 ave in the POD hotel. The restaurant decor is kind of interesting as it does give out a tropical-ish vibe to it. There is an outdoor area that has a lot of those basket woven seats with a cushion on them. From where we sat outdoors, we can see views of the H&M building and the Empire State Building in plain sight.

item.title: Mother of Pearl
item.description: Interesting decor. They have a shark drink where it has a bunch of blood on it. Notice a bunch of people bring their dates here.
